title: ARABIC MEDIUM
utme_requirements: SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies and any other subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ARABIC/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other subject.
subjects: Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: ARABIC/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic and two (2) of Economics, Government, Geography and Social studies
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) of Geography, History/ Government and Economics.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION (DM)
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science and Chemistry.

title: ENGLISH/ARABIC
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Arabic and English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, any other subject.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ENGLISH/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Literature in English and any other Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, Literature in English and any other subject.

title: ENGLISH/HAUSA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics,  Hausa, Literature in English and any other Arts  subject.
subjects: Literature in English and any other Arts subject

title: ENGLISH/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Islamic Studies, Literature in English and one (1) Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: ENGLISH/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Yoruba and any Arts subject.
subjects: Literature in English, Yoruba and any Arts subjects

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following

1. Biology/Agricultural Science

2. Chemistry

3. Physics and

4. General Science
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) of

1. Economics

2. Government/History

3. Geography
subjects: Islamic Studies, Government/History and any one (1)  Social/Arts Subject.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: YORUBA/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History, Yoruba and one (1)   Arts/subject.
